productDescriptions.5678: Round blue stamp with ergonomic grip, designed for daily use.

productDescriptions.2890: Classic MobiStamp model, suitable for professional paperwork.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Settings
accessibility.largeControlsDesc: Increases size of buttons and controls
accessibility.keyboardTip: Tip: Use arrow keys to move selected elements when focused on the preview area

preview.title: Preview
preview.customizeStamp: Customize your stamp to see a preview
preview.dragInstructions: Click and drag elements to reposition them
preview.ariaLabel: Stamp preview area. Use arrow keys to position elements when selected.

design.autoArrangeTooltip: Intelligently arrange text for optimal layout based on your stamp shape, maintaining proper orientation and spacing.
design.title: Custom stamp designer
design.savedDescription: Your design has been saved and will be available when you return
design.loadedDescription: Your saved design has been loaded
design.saveDesignForLaterTooltip: Save your current design to continue later
design.productInfo: Designing a {{name}} stamp ({{size}}). You can add up to {{lines}} lines of text and choose from {{inkColors}} ink colors.
design.uploadInstructions: Click to upload an image file or drag and drop
design.uploadRecommendation: Recommended: Square PNG or SVG with transparent background
design.logoDragTip: You can also drag the logo directly on the preview area
design.logoTipText: After positioning your logo, click "Next" to add and arrange your text.
design.textOnlyDesc: Proceed without a logo to create a text-only stamp design

textEditor.title: Text Lines
textEditor.helpText: Add and edit text for your stamp. Click on a line to select it and adjust its properties.

design.autoArrangeTooltip: Intelligently arrange text for optimal layout based on your stamp shape, maintaining proper orientation and spacing.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for high-quality self-inking stamps in Morocco. We offer a wide range of stamps for business and personal use.
footer.deliveryDescription: We offer free delivery for all orders in Casablanca and surrounding regions.

hero.title: Professional Self-Inking Stamps
hero.subtitle: Quality stamps for your business needs
hero.description: Design and order custom self-inking stamps for your business. Choose from various sizes, shapes, and colors.

features.whyChooseDesc: We offer high-quality self-inking stamps with a variety of options to meet your business needs in Morocco.
features.premiumQualityDesc: All our stamps are made with high-quality materials for long-lasting durability.
features.customizableDesc: Easily design your own stamps with our intuitive online design tool.
features.fastDeliveryDesc: Free delivery in Casablanca and surrounding regions with quick processing times.
features.wideSelectionDesc: Choose from various sizes, models, and brands to fit your specific needs.

cta.readyToCreate: Ready to Create Your Custom Stamp?
cta.designerDesc: Design your own stamp now with our easy-to-use online designer tool. See a preview before you order!

contactBlock.title: Contact Us
contactBlock.description: Have questions about our products or need assistance with your order? We're here to help! Contact us using the information below or fill out the form.
contactBlock.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.

seo.indexDesc: Design and order custom self-inking stamps for your business or personal use. Choose from a wide range of models with free delivery in Casablanca, Morocco.
